nodes.text: from practicing their religious beliefs in Al aqsa mosque from time to time.. and the list continues…

Israel follows a repeated script of violations against Palestinians every now & then.. this has to be ended.. Israel has to stop it.\n\nYet i didn’t talk about how Israel invaded the Palestinian lands in the first place.. in other words..how British created Israel from nothing.

We need to know that this Palestine Israel warfare is been going on for 70+ years.. but, Since 2018 It’s been a status quo.. however, Israel does not stop its violations against Palestinians.. For example, israel continues to expel the Palestinians from their homes.. ceasing them
As a result, 70 Palestinians were killed & around 13 children amongst them.\n\n#GenocideinGaza #IsraeliTerrorism #GhazaUnderAttach
Why does Israel target populated areas?\nWhy does it retaliate against protesters in that hard way?\nVery first question..why does it expel Palestinians frim their homes?

This act of innocence violence provoked Hamas to fire rockets at southern of Israel.

Israel responded with massive airstrikes targeting populated neighborhoods in Gaza.

#Israeli #GazaUnderAttackk #Gaza #Hamas #IsraelCrimes #GazzaUnderAttack #IsraelPalestine

Just imagining that someone steals your home and expels you..Another one shoots you and you’re unarmed at your worship place because you refused to be evicted from your house.. how would you react to this!\n\n#GenociedinGaza #GazzedeSoykırım #GazaUnderFire #GazaUnderFire #GazaUnder

Just have a second.. think about it.. does it really a necessity to shoot people at their worship place because they were protesting?!\n\n#AllLivesMatter #freedom #BLM #London4Palestine #FreePalaestine #GazaStrip #GazaUnderAttak #Gaza_under_attack_now

These clashes escalated in Ramadan when zionist police raided on Al Aqsa mosque to shoot unarmed civilians. Just because they were protesting against eviction plans. Not to forget that there were women & children amongst these civilians.. \n\n#GazaUnderFire

This violence began with a series of clashes in Sheikh Jarrah. -a neighborhood in Gaza- between the Palestinians & zionist police men when Palestinian residents in the mentioned neighborhood had to protest against Israel’s plans of evicting Palestinians from their neighborhood.
